description:
This market refers to the Counter-Strike match between Curralzinho and BESTIA Academy in the CCT South America Series #8 Group Stage, scheduled for February 7 at 8:30AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Curralzinho" if Curralzinho wins 2 or more maps than BESTIA Academy in this match.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "BESTIA Academy".

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

events.description:
This market refers to the Counter-Strike match between Curralzinho and BESTIA Academy in the CCT South America Series #8 Group Stage, scheduled for February 7 at 8:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Curralzinho" if Curralzinho win the match against BESTIA Academy.

This market will resolve to "BESTIA Academy" if BESTIA Academy win the match against Curralzinho.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to the team who wins. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50. 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://hltv.org/.
events.title: Counter-Strike: Curralzinho vs BESTIA Academy (BO3) - CCT South America Series #8 Group Stage
